title: WTB- Low Grade Broad Leaf 350, Uzit or Black Lenox

posts.post_title: WTB- Low Grade Broad Leaf 350, Uzit or Black Lenox
posts.post_content:
Preferably a non star player, in the 1-3 range. At least decently centered and no paper loss on the back. Please send what you have available to [url]jlcors11@gmail.com[/url] 

Thanks
Joe
